casebody.data:
LEWIS
v.
TRANSIT MANAGEMENT OF CHARLOTTE, et al. 3P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 8, 2017 Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Mark T. Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Lauren H. Walker, Attorney at Law, for Lewis, Kelly F. John Brem Smith, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, Elizabeth Hilker, Attorney at Law, Tara D. Muller, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Transit Management of Charlotte, et al.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 3rd of May 2017 for Leave to Withdraw Petitions for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of June 2017."
